constituent: manipulate, outhouse, small, little, crown, mouth, hand
koohiiStory1: If you´re going to manipulate your body with your hand, then go do it in an outhouse, at least!
koohiiStory2: Instead of magazines, we keep a Rubiks Cube in the outhouse to manipulate with your hands while you do your business.
myStory: thao tác. quản lý. tay cho miệng sáng lấp lánh
